title: Bulletfury Goes Open Source
summary: Bulletfury V2 is now fully open source, with Unity collision support, scene previews, performance improvements, and a deep module system for custom bullet behaviors.

title: Bullet Pattern Generation - Circles, Arcs, and Spirals
summary: How great danmaku patterns aren't hand-placed; they're mathematical functions. A walkthrough of a single algorithm, evolved from a point on a circle into spiraling, fractal barrages.
